title: Life in Pieces
description: An unemployed stay at home dad who opens the paper one morning to find he is running for congress, a young man struggling to hold onto a life that is slipping away while meeting the love of his life, and a crazy old man who couldn't care less about any of this all cross paths in Christopher Profeta's debut novel "Life in Pieces." These lives come gracefully together to show that we are never to old to come of age.
author: Christopher Profeta
